item.title: Shawn add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description:
"Don’t talk to me about her, John: I told you not to go near her; she is not worthy of notice; I do not choose that either you or your sisters should associate with her.” Here, leaning over the banister, I cried out suddenly, and without at all deliberating on my words—
“They are not fit to associate with me!" -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Shawn add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "And now I have to stop. Because every time I remember this, I have to cry a little by myself. I don't know why something that made me so happy then feels so sad now. Maybe that is the way it is with the best memories." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Shawn add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "Let's look on the bright side: we're having an adventure, Fezzik, and most people live and die without being as lucky as we are." -- William Goldman
